Name: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients: Chocolate chips (as much as your heart desires)
Other Materials: 1 hand mixer with puree and whisk attachments
Instructions: 1) Wait to make until the bananas are over ripe, with brown spots all over.
2) Grease the bread pan with vegetable shortening, then dust with a pinch of flour until bottom and sides are covered. Set oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and set pan aside.
3) In a medium mixing bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside.
4) In another medium mixing bowl, puree the bananas, then mix in sugar, egg, and cooking oil.
5) Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly and add chocolate chips.
6) Pour dough into the greased pan, then bake for 50-60 minutes.
7) Once baking is done, take the loaf out of the oven and leave in the pan for 10-15 minutes, then remove and place on a cooling rack. Slice up and enjoy!
